# Prefix scan

## Simple example with cumsum

```{r}
x <- c(12, 5, 13)
cumsum(x)
```


## Algorithm 

### Inclusive vs. Exclusive scan

```{r echo=F}
cumsum_inclusive <- function(x) {
  return(cumsum(x))
}

cumsum_exclusive <- function(x) {
  res <- c(0)
  temp <- 0
  for (i in 1:length(x)-1) {
    last_result <- temp
    temp <- res[i] + x[i]
    res <- c(res, temp)
  }
  return(res)
}

```


## Simple examples with cumsum

```{r}
x <- c(12, 5, 16)
cumsum_inclusive(x)
```

```{r}
x <- c(12, 5, 16)
cumsum_exclusive(x)
```
